attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of returning America to its former glory. Instead I was confronted with leftist propaganda over and over again. Who ever this Donald Trump is does not understand how to win over people’s votes. His support for Anti-Fa and minorities is ever present. Geez and all I wanted was a president who believes that white people are the superior race. DO NOT DOWNLOAD! HORRIBLE APP. HORRIBLE PRESIDENTIAL CANDIDATE.
